pages.text: $(li)To start falconry with the $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagle$(/l), you will need to craft the Falconry Glove.$(br)$(li)When held either in the main or off-hand, this glove can be used to pick up eagles and hold them in hand.

$(li)To launch and eagle from the hand, simply punch.$(br)$(li)If launched while staring at a mob, the eagle will fly to this mob, attack, and, if it survives, return to the hand.$(br)$(li)If no creature is selected the eagle will simply jump off the glove.
